{"step_by_step_thinking": "To test the statistical significance of the difference in heights among three socio-economic groups, we need to compare the means of the groups. Since we are comparing more than two groups, the most appropriate statistical test is the one-way analysis of variance (one-way ANOVA). This test allows us to determine if there is a significant difference in means among the groups. Therefore, the correct answer is D.
